description: Welcome to your cart. From here, you can create a custom map using the resources listed below. Use the checkboxes to select the resources you want to include, then click the View on map button at the bottom of the table. If a resource doesn’t have an available map layer, it can’t be selected — but you can still view its details by clicking the row in the table to navigate to the corresponding record page. To remove a resource, click the garbage can icon next to its name, or use the Remove all button to clear the list.
title: My Cart
